IEEE Draft Standard for Information Technology - Telecommunications and Information Exchange Between Systems - Local and Metropolitan Area Networks -- Specific Requirements -- Part 17: Resilient Packet Ring (RPR) Access Method and Physical Layer Specifications -- Amendment: 2 -- Protected Inter-Ring Connection
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P802.17c/D2.1, Nov 2009

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This amendment enables a service provider to use the architecture and protocols of IEEE Std 802.17TM to support ring interconnection through dual station homing, providing 50-ms protection, loop preventation, and load balancing of traffic between rings.
